title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3951 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 29, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3951




On Monday, June 28, 2010, the President signed into law:
H.R. 3951, which designates a facility of the United States Postal Service as the Roy Rondeno, Sr. Post Office Building.Â
